text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActRelationshipType where concept is-a GOAL

name: ActRelationshipHasGoal
title: ActRelationshipHasGoal
description: A goal that one defines given a patient's health condition. Subsequently planned actions aim to meet that goal. Source is an observation or condition node, target must be an observation in goal mood.
